bibles.title: Sanskrit Bible (NT) in IAST Script (satyavedaḥ|)
bibles.title_vernacular: satyavedaḥ| Sanskrit Bible (NT) in IAST Script
bibles.description: Thank you for your interest in Sanskrit Bible. Sanskrit Bible (NT) is freely available in 22 different scripts of your choice. This edition is in IAST script and is based on the Sanskrit translation of the Holy Bible published by Calcutta Baptist Missionaries in 1851. Please visit SanskritBible.in to learn more about Sanskrit Bible and to download various free Christian literature.
